snippet: When a group of journalists, New Hampshire pols and former presidential candidates got together Wednesday night to honor the 100th anniversary of the first-in-the-nation primary, there was much yearning for the good old days.
abstract: When a group of journalists, New Hampshire pols and former presidential candidates got together Wednesday night to honor the 100th anniversary of the first-in-the-nation primary, there was much yearning for the good old days.

headline.main: New Hampshire's Wistful Look at Off-the-Cuff Politics
